org.sensorhub.api.persistence

Interface ITimeSeriesDataStore<FilterType extends IDataFilter>

  • Type Parameters:
    FilterType -
    All Superinterfaces:
    IEventProducer, IRecordDataStore<DataKey,FilterType>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IObsStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryBasicStorage.TimeSeriesImpl

    public interface ITimeSeriesDataStore<FilterType extends IDataFilter>
extends IRecordDataStore<DataKey,FilterType>

    This interface adds time tagging support to a record storage

    Since:
    Nov 27, 2014
    Author:
    Alex Robin

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] getDataTimeRange()
      Get time range of all data contained in this storage.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataTimeRange

        double[] getDataTimeRange()
        Get time range of all data contained in this storage.
        Returns:
        array of length 2 in the form [minTime maxTime] or [NaN NaN] is data store is empty
